items.paragraph_text:
Mitsubishi Modbus DB9 5M Display Cable for Elevator Systems

The Mitsubishi Modbus DB9 5M Display Cable is a high-quality 5-meter RS-232 serial interface cable designed for elevator systems. It connects the CTB (Control Terminal Board) to the CCB (Control Communication Board), allowing technicians to perform essential tasks such as diagnostics, programming, and configuration of Mitsubishi elevator controllers and display units.

Engineered for reliable signal transmission, this Modbus display cable ensures stable and accurate data exchange. Its durable design supports consistent performance in maintenance, monitoring, and troubleshooting operations, reducing downtime and enhancing overall elevator reliability.

Key Specifications

  • Cable Length: 5 Meters
  • Interface: RS-232 Serial
  • Function: Diagnostics, Programming, and Configuration
  • Application: Mitsubishi Elevator Controllers and Displays
  • Compatibility: CTB to CCB Communication

Top Elevator Power Cable & Wire Provider in UAE

Bestech is a dependable elevator power cable and wire supplier in UAE, offering high-performance cables that ensure efficient communication, superior reliability, and compatibility with leading elevator brands, including Mitsubishi.

Command Board Cable 70cm for Elevator Control Board

The Command Board Cable 70cm for elevator control board is a specialized connection cable used to link the elevator push button panel to the calling PCB (Printed Circuit Board) inside the Car Operating Panel (COP). It ensures precise transmission of passenger commands—such as floor selections and door operations—enabling smooth communication with the elevator control system.

Built with durable materials and tested for consistent signal flow, this cable enhances the reliability and safety of elevator operations. Installing a high-quality command board cable helps maintain system efficiency, minimizes communication errors, and reduces maintenance downtime.

  • Function: Connects Push Button Panel to Calling PCB

items.keywords: Elevator Circuit breaker MCB 63A 4P, Elevator Circuit breaker supplier in UAE, Buy quality elevator circuit breaker
items.paragraph_text:
Reliable Elevator Circuit Breaker MCB 63A 4P

The Elevator Circuit Breaker MCB 63A 4P is designed to protect three-phase elevator circuits with a neutral line from electrical faults. This compact yet powerful miniature circuit breaker (MCB) automatically interrupts the current flow during overloads or short circuits, preventing damage to elevator wiring, control panels, and other electrical components.

Featuring a 4-pole (4P) design, the MCB 63A 4P ensures simultaneous disconnection of all three phases and the neutral, providing complete safety during faults. Its thermal-magnetic trip mechanism offers reliable protection under varying electrical loads, making it ideal for modern elevator systems and other heavy-duty applications requiring precise electrical safety.

Key Specifications

  • Model: MCB 63A 4P
  • Function: Overcurrent Protection
  • Poles: 4P (Three-Phase + Neutral)
  • Mechanism: Thermal-Magnetic Trip
  • Application: Elevator Control Panels, Heavy-Duty Electrical Circuits
  • Compatible Brands: OTIS / SIGMA / FUJI / MITSUBISHI / KONE

Trusted Elevator Circuit Breaker Spare Parts Supplier UAE

Bestech is a leading elevator circuit breaker spare parts supplier in the UAE, providing durable, high-quality MCBs built for reliable performance, electrical safety, and long-term operation across all major elevator systems.

items.paragraph_text:
High-Efficiency Elevator Switching Power Supply LRS-150-24

The Elevator Switching Power Supply LRS-150-24 is an advanced Switched-Mode Power Supply (SMPS) engineered specifically for elevator control systems. It efficiently converts electrical energy using high-frequency switching, ensuring stable and consistent DC output while minimizing power loss.

Unlike traditional linear power supplies that generate excess heat, this SMPS offers superior energy efficiency and reliable performance. Delivering a 24V DC output, it powers critical elevator functions such as motor and brake control, supporting smooth and safe operation in modern elevator systems.

Key Specifications

  • Model: LRS-150-24
  • Type: Switching Power Supply (SMPS)
  • Output Voltage: 24V DC
  • Rated Power: 150W
  • Application: Elevator Control Panels, Motor & Brake Circuits
  • Compatible Brands: OTIS / SIGMA / FUJI / MITSUBISHI / KONE

items.paragraph_text:
Reliable Elevator Phase Sequence Relay XJ12-A

The Elevator Phase Sequence Relay XJ12-A is engineered to protect three-phase elevator systems by continuously monitoring the correct phase order — R (L1), Y (L2), and B (L3). Maintaining proper phase sequence is essential for the safe and smooth operation of motors, compressors, and other rotating components within the elevator control system.

This relay quickly detects incorrect wiring or phase loss, helping to prevent equipment damage and operational failures. Designed for durability and accuracy, it ensures long-term, stable performance in elevator control panels and electrical systems.

Key Specifications

  • Model: XJ12-A
  • Function: Phase Sequence and Phase Loss Detection
  • Input: Three-Phase Power (R, Y, B)
  • Application: Elevator Control Panels, Motor Protection
  • Compatible Brands: OTIS / SIGMA / FUJI / MITSUBISHI / KONE

Your Trusted Elevator Phase Sequence Relay Supplier

Bestech is a trusted elevator electrical spare parts supplier in UAE, offering precision-built and reliable phase sequence relays that ensure protection, performance, and durability across all major elevator systems.

items.paragraph_text:
Reliable Elevator Emergency Power Supply Unit (EPSU)

The Elevator Emergency Power Supply Unit (EPSU) ensures safe elevator operation during a main power failure by providing a dependable backup power source. It maintains essential elevator functions such as cabin lighting, ventilation, and control systems, allowing the elevator to travel to the nearest floor and open its doors safely for passengers.

Built for reliability and safety, this power supply unit guarantees uninterrupted emergency operation and supports consistent performance across leading elevator brands. It is a critical component for enhancing passenger safety and ensuring system stability during unexpected power disruptions.

Key Specifications

  • Model: EPSU (Emergency Power Supply Unit)
  • Function: Backup Power for Elevator Systems
  • Output: Stable DC Supply for Lighting, Control, and Ventilation
  • Input: AC Mains Power with Automatic Switch to Backup
  • Application: Elevator Control Panels, Emergency Operation
  • Compatible Brands: OTIS / SIGMA / FUJI / MITSUBISHI / KONE

Your Trusted Elevator Electrical Spare Parts Supplier

Bestech is a trusted elevator electrical spare parts supplier in the UAE, offering tested and durable EPSU components that deliver reliable backup power, long service life, and safe elevator operation across all major brands.

The Elevator Intercom Handset is a crucial emergency communication device installed inside the elevator car. Traditionally designed like a telephone handset, it allowed passengers to directly communicate with building staff during power failures or emergency situations. Modern systems, in line with ADA and EN safety regulations, now support hands-free or two-way communication for enhanced accessibility and safety.

This intercom handset integrates seamlessly with the Car Operating Panel (COP), elevator alarm, and control systems, ensuring reliable and clear voice communication at all times. Ideal for commercial and residential elevators, it provides peace of mind through effective passenger-to-staff connectivity.

Efficient Elevator Alarm System for Passenger Safety

The Elevator Alarm System is a critical safety device that enables passengers trapped inside an elevator car to request assistance. Activated by a clearly marked button, the alarm system connects directly to building staff or emergency responders, ensuring a fast and coordinated response during power failures, mechanical malfunctions, or other emergencies.

Modern elevator alarm systems are designed for reliability, featuring both audio and visual indicators to enhance accessibility. They comply with international elevator safety standards, including ADA and EN requirements, ensuring safe and efficient communication in all situations. Built with durable components and user-friendly design, these alarm systems are essential for maintaining elevator safety and passenger confidence.

The NICE-L-C-4022 offers consistent performance under frequent switching and demanding conditions, making it a trusted choice for modern elevator control systems.

Elevator Inverter 11KW: AS380 for Reliable Lift Control

The Elevator Inverter 11KW: AS380 is a high-performance integrated drive and controller developed by Shanghai STEP Electric Corporation. Designed to manage both motor control and drive functions, it ensures efficient, stable, and smooth elevator operation. With advanced closed-loop vector control technology, it offers precise motor speed regulation, improved torque balance, and consistent acceleration and braking performance.

Operating on a 380V AC three-phase input, the AS380 delivers reliable performance for mid- to high-capacity elevator systems. Compact and energy-efficient, it is built for durability and long service life, helping enhance control accuracy, passenger comfort, and operational reliability in modern lifts.

Key Specifications

  • Model: AS380
  • Power Rating: 11 KW
  • Manufacturer: Shanghai STEP Electric Corporation
  • Function: Integrated Inverter and Controller
  • Input Voltage: 380V AC (Three-Phase)
